hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Bombs (20 pieces)# and #Farore's Wind#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #the Song of Storms#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Goron Tunic#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Heart Container#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Bombchu Shop#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.
